data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Khotan, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Khotan, Xinjiang Uygur, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Khotan, Xinjiang Uygur, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Khotan that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Khotan, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Ladakhi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Ladakhi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Ladakhi people is yours.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Khotan, Xinjiang Uygur, China today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: the county of Khotan has (about) 9,642 people who know Jesus, 2,053 people who know about him culturally, and 115,405 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Khotan to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

location.name: Khotan
location.people_groups_list: Uygur, Taklimakan, Keriya, Uygur, Yutian, Nubra
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Uygur, Taklimakan (300), Keriya (800), Uygur, Yutian (71,000), Nubra (700)
